001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base.TableField;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.FilterStrategy;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.sort.SortingStrategy;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * Defines the core operations for interacting with table components.
010 *
011 * <p>This interface provides methods for reading table data, retrieving rows based on different criteria,
012 * inserting values into specific table cells, filtering table contents, and sorting table data.
013 * It abstracts table interactions for different table structures.
014 *
015 * <p>Implementations of this interface are expected to handle the underlying table processing.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public interface Table {
020
021   /**
022    * Reads the entire table and maps it to a list of objects of the specified type.
023    *
024    * @param clazz The class type representing a table row.
025    * @param <T>   The type of the row representation.
026    * @return A list of objects representing the table rows.
027    */
028   <T> List<T> readTable(Class<T> clazz);
029
030   /**
031    * Reads the table while considering specific fields for mapping.
032    *
033    * @param clazz  The class type representing a table row.
034    * @param fields The specific table fields to be read.
035    * @param <T>    The type of the row representation.
036    * @return A list of objects containing only the specified fields.
037    */
038   <T> List<T> readTable(Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields);
039
040   /**
041    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table.
042    *
043    * @param start The starting row index (inclusive).
044    * @param end   The ending row index (exclusive).
045    * @param clazz The class type representing a table row.
046    * @param <T>   The type of the row representation.
047    * @return A list of objects representing the specified range of table rows.
048    */
049   <T> List<T> readTable(int start, int end, Class<T> clazz);
050
051   /**
052    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table while considering specified fields.
053    *
054    * @param start  The starting row index (inclusive).
055    * @param end    The ending row index (exclusive).
056    * @param clazz  The class type representing a table row.
057    * @param fields The specific table fields to be read.
058    * @param <T>    The type of the row representation.
059    * @return A list of objects representing the specified table rows with the chosen fields.
060    */
061   <T> List<T> readTable(int start, int end, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields);
062
063   /**
064    * Reads a single row from the table based on its index.
065    *
066    * @param row   The row index (1-based index).
067    * @param clazz The class type representing a table row.
068    * @param <T>   The type of the row representation.
069    * @return An object representing the table row.
070    */
071   <T> T readRow(int row, Class<T> clazz);
072
073   /**
074    * Reads a single row from the table that matches the given search criteria.
075    *
076    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values to match in the row.
077    * @param clazz          The class type representing a table row.
078    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
079    * @return The first matching row as an object of type {@code T}.
080    */
081   <T> T readRow(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz);
082
083   /**
084    * Reads a specific row from the table while considering specific fields.
085    *
086    * @param row    The row index (1-based index).
087    * @param clazz  The class type representing a table row.
088    * @param fields The specific table fields to be read.
089    * @param <T>    The type of the row representation.
090    * @return An object representing the specified row with only the chosen fields.
091    */
092   <T> T readRow(int row, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields);
093
094   /**
095    * Reads a row that matches the search criteria while considering specific fields.
096    *
097    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values to match in the row.
098    * @param clazz          The class type representing a table row.
099    * @param fields         The specific table fields to be read.
100    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
101    * @return The first matching row as an object of type {@code T}, with only the chosen fields.
102    */
103   <T> T readRow(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields);
104
105   /**
106    * Inserts a full object as a row into the table at the specified row index.
107    *
108    * @param row       The row index (1-based index).
109    * @param classType The class type representing a table row.
110    * @param data      The object containing the data to be inserted.
111    * @param <T>       The type of the row representation.
112    */
113   <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, T data);
114
115   /**
116    * Inserts a value into a specific cell within a row.
117    * If not specified, the value is inserted at index 1.
118    *
119    * @param row       The row index (1-based index).
120    * @param classType The class type representing a table row.
121    * @param field     The table field to insert the value into.
122    * @param values    The values to be inserted.
123    * @param <T>       The type of the row representation.
124    */
125   default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, String... values) {
126      insertCellValue(row, classType, field, 1, values);
127   }
128
129   /**
130    * Inserts a value into a specific cell within a row at the given cell index.
131    *
132    * @param row       The row index (1-based index).
133    * @param classType The class type representing a table row.
134    * @param field     The table field to insert the value into.
135    * @param index     The cell index within the row (1-based index).
136    * @param values    The values to be inserted.
137    * @param <T>       The type of the row representation.
138    */
139   <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, int index, String... values);
140
141   /**
142    * Inserts values into a cell within a row that matches the given search criteria.
143    *
144    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values to match in the row.
145    * @param classType      The class type representing a table row.
146    * @param field          The table field to insert the value into.
147    * @param values         The values to be inserted.
148    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
149    */
150   default <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field,
151                                    String... values) {
152      insertCellValue(searchCriteria, classType, field, 1, values);
153   }
154
155   /**
156    * Inserts values into a cell within a row that matches the search criteria at the given cell index.
157    *
158    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values to match in the row.
159    * @param classType      The class type representing a table row.
160    * @param field          The table field to insert the value into.
161    * @param index          The cell index within the row (1-based index).
162    * @param values         The values to be inserted.
163    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
164    */
165   <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, int index,
166                            String... values);
167
168   /**
169    * Inserts an object as a row into the table based on matching search criteria.
170    *
171    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values to match in the row.
172    * @param classType      The class type representing a table row.
173    * @param data           The object containing the data to be inserted.
174    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
175    */
176   <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, T data);
177
178   /**
179    * Applies a filter to a column in the table.
180    *
181    * @param tclass         The class type representing a table row.
182    * @param column         The table field representing the column to be filtered.
183    * @param filterStrategy The filter strategy to be applied.
184    * @param values         The values to be used for filtering.
185    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
186    */
187   <T> void filterTable(Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String... values);
188
189   /**
190    * Sorts the table based on the specified column.
191    *
192    * @param tclass          The class type representing a table row.
193    * @param column          The table field representing the column to be sorted.
194    * @param sortingStrategy The sorting strategy to be applied.
195    * @param <T>             The type of the row representation.
196    */
197   <T> void sortTable(Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, SortingStrategy sortingStrategy);
198
199}
